ingredients: 1 cup chopped dates,   +   1/4 cup chopped pecans,   +   1/4 cup water,   +   1/2  very ripe banana, mashed, 1 large egg, lightly beaten, 2 tablespoons butter, melted,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon cinnamon,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt
nutrition: Total Fat 3g 4%, Saturated Fat 1g 5%, Cholesterol 14mg 5%, Sodium 73mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 14g 5%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 0mg 2%, Calcium 24mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 95mg 2%
